scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,ui -c auto "npm -w backend run dev" "npm -w ui run dev"
scripts.dev:mcp-portal: concurrently -n backend,mcp-portal -c auto "npm -w backend run dev" "npm -w mcp-portal run dev"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n backend,ui,mcp-portal -c auto "npm -w backend run dev" "npm -w ui run dev" "npm -w mcp-portal run dev"
scripts.dev:with-agents: concurrently -n backend,ui,agents -c auto "npm -w backend run dev" "npm -w ui run dev" "npm -w agent-api run dev"
scripts.test:e2e: npm -w backend run build && npm -w backend run test:e2e
scripts.docker:rebuild: docker-compose down && docker-compose build && docker-compose up -d
scripts.build:prod: npm -w backend run build:prod && npm -w shared run build:prod && npm -w ui run build:prod
